document.full_text: a "minuscule" amount of radioactive iodine has been detected in a milk sample from the u.s. state of washington as the government monitors for effects of the nuclear crisis in japan, u.s. regulators said on wednesday.
document.title: u.s. finds tiny amount of radiation in milk sample
lines_and_colors: a "minuscule" amount of radioactive iodine has been detected in a milk sample from the u.s. state of washington as the government monitors for effects of the nuclear crisis in japan, u.s. regulators said on wednesday.
